sentence.Network_en: I'm sure Rose will outlive many of us.
sentence.Network_cn: 我肯定罗丝会比我们中的很多人长命。

sentence.Network_en: He will not outlive this night.
The world has outlived much, and will outlive a great deal more.
sentence.Network_cn: 世界已经存在了很久, 而且还将更久远地存在下去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... lurk v. 潜伏，埋伏 outlive vt. 比…活得长 steer v. 引导，带领.
温州大学大学英语课程 ... outdo:vt. 比…做地好 outlive:vt. 比…长寿 outtalk:vt. （用高声或说话技巧等）讲赢（某人）.
职称英语常用前缀、后缀_诗雨_新浪博客 ... nonsense（ 胡说，废话） outlive（ 比……长命，比……耐久） polycentric（ 多中心的）.
新版英语阅读(二)单词 - 豆丁网 ... measure 程度； 分量； 测量 outlive 活过…， 比…经久 5 pessimism 悲观.

list.abs: outline summarizing v. 总结；概括outlive survive v. 活过某人；比．．．经久outlying remote a. 远外的；边远的
"outlive"怎么说合适... ... outlive weather 经受住; outlive usefulness 失去时效; outlive one's heallh 年老多病.
Tadpole shrimp have outlived dinosaurs , trilobites and mammoths ., 鲎虫比恐龙 , 三叶虫 , 猛犸象更长寿.
The world has outlived much , and will outlive a great deal more ., 世界已经存在了很久 , 而且还将更久远地存在下去.

entry.def: If one person outlives another, they are still alive after the second person has died. If one thing outlives another thing, the first thing continues to exist after the second has disappeared or been replaced.

example.ex: I'm sure Rose will outlive many of us...
example.tran: 我肯定罗丝会比我们中的很多人长命。

example.ex: The UN is an organisation which has long since outlived its usefulness...
example.tran: 联合国是一个早已形同虚设的机构。

sentences.sentence: "She outlived her husband by many years"

auth_sentence.content: I think this long process will outlive us.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think this long process will outlive us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think this long process will outlive us.

auth_sentence.content: Some could even outlive the author, for all we know.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some could even outlive the author, for all we know.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some could even outlive the author, for all we know.

auth_sentence.content: They would outlive her children's childhoods.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They would outlive her children's childhoods.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出去.过时,外面"; 2. 表示"超过.过度"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 室外的, 户外的, 野外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+door门→adj.室外的, 户外的, 野外的
out出去.过时,外面+er→adj.外部的,外面的,外层的
out出去.过时,外面+going走→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
out出去.过时,外面+land地+ish……的→外地来的→奇异的
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out超过.过度+size范围→范围超出
out超过.过度+standing标准的→adj.突出的, 显著的
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+side旁边→在外边
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out出去.过时,外面+break中断→事情断裂→爆发
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外出, 旅行, 散步
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+ing状态→n.外出, 旅行, 散步
out出去.过时,外面+let表名词→n.出口, 出路
out出去.过时,外面+line线条→划出线条→大纲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 景色, 风光, 观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+look看→n.景色, 风光, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 产量, 输出, 输出量
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+put放,摆→放出,输出→产量
out出去.过时,外面+rage怒气→怒气外露→粗暴
out出去.过时,外面+set安置好→在外面放置好→开端
out出去.过时,外面+skirt裙子;引申为城市周边+s→郊区
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+law法律→超越法律之人
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+bid出价→出价超出
out超过.过度+do做→做得超出别人
out超过.过度+live活→超过别人活着
out超过.过度+number数量→v.在数量上超过
out超过.过度+wear穿→穿出了[洞]
out超过.过度+wit智慧→机智超出别人

means.word_mean: 比(某人)长寿;活到(某事)已被遗忘

sentences.en: The old couple outlived several of their children.
sentences.cn: 这对老夫妻比他们的好几个孩子都活得长。
